channel.title: Windows on huyixi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on huyixi's Blog

item.title: Windows Installation Guide
item.description: Due to the length of this article and the lack of a table of contents in my personal blog, I recommend reading it on my wiki site. Here is the link. You can quickly navigate using the table of contents on that site. Background: This guide is based on my extensive experience with multiple Windows installations, designed to meet my Windows installation needs.
